issue.title: Fix jenkins plugin installation

repository.name: gitops-playground
repository.description: Creates a complete GitOps-based operational stack / IDP on your Kubernetes clusters

license.name: GNU Affero General Public License v3.0

issue.body:
We were successfully uploading and installing the plugin and then following the redirect to the progress page. However, curl was removing the basic authentication. As a result, we were encountering error 403 for the redirect, not for the upload.

This is a bug in curl: https://github.com/curl/curl/issues/11486

Therefore, we temporarily replaced -L with --location-trusted for jenkins

issue.title: do not clear the credentials on redirect to absolute URL

repository.name: curl
repository.description: A command line tool and library for transferring data with URL syntax, supporting DICT, FILE, FTP, FTPS, GOPHER, GOPHERS, HTTP, HTTPS, IMAP, IMAPS, LDAP, LDAPS, MQTT, POP3, POP3S, RTMP, RTMPS, RTSP, SCP, SFTP, SMB, SMBS, SMTP, SMTPS, TELNET, TFTP, WS and WSS. libcurl offers a myriad of powerful features

issue.body:
Regression shipped in 8.2.0 from commit  dd4d1a26959f63a2c

Add test 979 to verify.
    
Fixes #11486

body: Is this one worth a point release?
Doh! I should have kept reading my e-mail backlog...
Thank you for fixing this so quickly! :)

issue.title: Remove workaround for curl 8.2.0

repository.name: gitops-playground
repository.description: Creates a complete GitOps-based operational stack / IDP on your Kubernetes clusters

license.name: GNU Affero General Public License v3.0

issue.body:
A bug in curl (https://github.com/curl/curl/issues/11486) broke the
jenkins plugin installation. We introduced a workaround in https://github.com/cloudogu/gitops-playground/commit/16300dea3434313840533257838728e3b8aeddae.

A fix for curl is released and we can remove the workaround now.
